statements: SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE cost_price BETWEEN 20 AND 30;
SELECT id, product_name, market_trend FROM products ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE market_trend IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY product_name ASC, cost_price DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT product_name, price, cost_price FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 AND market_trend = 'Stable' ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT id, product_name, market_trend FROM products WHERE market_trend IS NULL OR price < 50 ORDER BY id DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT product_name, price, cost_price FROM products WHERE market_trend LIKE '%Up%' OR market_trend LIKE '%Down%' ORDER BY price, cost_price LIMIT 10;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE market_trend IS NOT NULL ORDER BY id ASC, price ASC, cost_price DESC LIMIT 15;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50;
SELECT product_name, cost FROM products ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE target_market='USA';
SELECT strategy_name, optimal_price FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY optimal_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price BETWEEN 20 AND 50 ORDER BY product_id ASC;
SELECT product_name, cost FROM products WHERE cost < 30 ORDER BY cost DESC;
SELECT * FROM pricing_strategies WHERE target_market = 'Global' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC, optimal_price DESC;
SELECT product_name, price, cost FROM products WHERE price > cost ORDER BY price DESC, cost ASC;
SELECT id, name, price, category FROM products;
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price >= 100;
SELECT category, price, name FROM products ORDER BY category DESC, price ASC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date >= '2021-01-01';
SELECT strategy_name, optimal_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE optimal_price < 50;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY name DESC
SELECT id, name, category FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY id
SELECT trend_name, trend_description FROM market_trends WHERE trend_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31'
SELECT strategy_name, optimal_price FROM pricing_strategies WHERE optimal_price < 100 ORDER BY strategy_id
SELECT * FROM products p JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON p.price = ps.optimal_price
SELECT * FROM products
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics'
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_type FROM pricing_strategies ORDER BY strategy_id DESC
SELECT p.product_name, ot.optimal_price FROM products p JOIN optimal_pricing ot ON p.product_id = ot.product_id
SELECT mt.trend_name, ps.strategy_name, ps.strategy_type FROM market_trends mt JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON mt.trend_id = ps.strategy_id
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM products WHERE price > 50 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT trend_name, trend_description, trend_value FROM market_trends WHERE trend_value < 0.5 ORDER BY trend_value ASC;
SELECT strategy_name, strategy_type FROM pricing_strategies WHERE strategy_type = 'dynamic' ORDER BY strategy_name ASC;

SELECT product_name, price, strategy_name FROM products p JOIN optimal_pricing op ON p.product_id = op.product_id JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON ps.strategy_id = op.strategy_id WHERE op.optimal_price < 100 ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT p.product_name, pt.trend_name, ps.strategy_name, op.optimal_price FROM products p JOIN optimal_pricing op ON p.product_id = op.product_id JOIN market_trends pt ON pt.trend_id = op.trend_id JOIN pricing_strategies ps ON ps.strategy_id = op.strategy_id ORDER BY pt.trend_name DESC, ps.strategy_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM products;
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT * FROM market_trends WHERE trend_name LIKE 'T%';
SELECT strategy_name, target_audience, effective_date FROM pricing_strategies;
SELECT * FROM products WHERE category='Electronics';
SELECT product_name, price FROM products WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC;

SELECT product_name, category, optimized_price FROM products JOIN product_pricing ON products.product_id = product_pricing.product_id WHERE product_pricing.optimized_price < 200 ORDER BY optimized_price ASC;

SELECT products.product_name, market_trends.trend_name FROM products JOIN product_pricing ON products.product_id = product_pricing.product_id JOIN market_trends ON product_pricing.trend_id = market_trends.trend_id WHERE products.category='Clothing' AND market_trends.trend_name='Summer Sale';
SELECT log_id, action_taken, action_time, user_id FROM audit_logs WHERE action_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY action_time DESC;
